results.name: a(n) = phi(n) - pi(n).
comment: It is known that a(n) >= 0 for n >= 61.
reference: D. S. Mitrinovic et al., Handbook of Number Theory, Kluwer, p. 11.
link: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=1..1000
